name: conference-schedule-chatgpt-app
description: ChatGPT app for browsing conference talks with a card-based interface

scripts.build: pnpm build:web && rm -rf server/dist && pnpm --filter=conference-schedule-server --prod deploy server/dist && cp -r web/dist server/dist/assets && node scripts/generate-widget-template-hashes.mjs && pnpm --filter=conference-schedule-server build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:web
scripts.legacy:build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web && ls web/dist/
